memberdef.name: plp_dwt_q32s_xpulpv2

briefdescription.para: Q31 fixed-point DWT on real input data for XPULPV2 extension.

parameterdescription.para: points to the input buffer (real data)
points to ouput buffer with Approximate coefficients
points to ouput buffer with Detailed coefficients
